titleStmt.title: A just vindication of the reputation of Mr. VVhite alderman of the city of Exon, in answer to a scurrillous pamphlet cald the Visihle [sic] vengeance, &c. Wherin is discovered the many falsities and untruths in that relation attested under the hand of his own servant that was with him in his journey till the day of his death: as also a true relation of the sad accident that befell him, with the circumstances thereof.
titleStmt.author: Dore, Christopher.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Rothwell, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Sunne and Fountaine in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Consists primarily of statements by Christopher Dore, White's servant.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Sunne
